heading: Video recordings. Production and direction.
general-note: Here are entered works on the artistic aspects of making video recordings. Works on the technical aspects of making video recordings, i.e., creating and storing moving images in an electronic form and displaying them on an electronic display are entered under. Video recording.. Works on the technical aspects of making motion pictures and their projection onto a screen are entered under. Cinematography.. General works on motion pictures themselves, including motion pictures as an art form, copyrighting, distribution, editing, plots, production, etc. are entered under. Motion pictures..
